PARTE 4 - RESPONDA LAS PREGUNTAS 16 A 22 DE ACUERDO CON EL SIGUIENTE TEXTO

Lea el texto y seleccione de la lista desplegable la palabra correcta para cada espacio.

Chichen Itza

 

Chichen Itza is the second (Ejemplo)  visited place of Mexico’s archaeological sites. This area is visited by many people (16)  the popular tourist town of Cancun, (17)  make a day trip on tourist buses.

In 2007, Chichen Itza’s El Castillo was (18)  one of the Seven Wonders of the World (19)  an international vote. The tourism officials in Mexico were happy about this, (20)  one of them proudly said, “The number of tourists visiting Chichen Itza will double by 2012”. In fact, it was like that.

(21)  monuments have been closed to the public over the past few years. While visitors can (22)  around them, they can no longer climb them or go inside.

PARTE 1 - RESPONDA LAS PREGUNTAS 1 A 5 DE ACUERDO CON EL EJEMPLO

Lea las descripciones. ¿Cuál palabra de la lista desplegable corresponde a cada descripción?. Una opción se usa para el ejemplo. Sobran dos palabras más.

Colors

(Ejemplo) This is the color of the sun.

(1)This is the color of milk and the snow.

(2)A lime and the leaves of most trees are this color.

(3)The shell of coconuts is this color on the outside.

(4)Rabbits eat carrots, which are this color.

(5)This is the color of the sea and sky on clear days.
